data.name: Table Ball - Colours DLC 1
data.detailed_description:
Custom Colours DLC 1

Do you want to customise your bumpers and balls?

WELL NOW YOU CAN

Features

New Colours
3 new colours to choose from.
Wanting a nice red ball? Well you can have that.
Want your bumpers to be green? You can do that too
Want your bumpers to be green while your ball is blue? OF COURSE YOU CAN.

What colours are included?

Red, Green and Blue

data.short_description: The Table Ball - Colours DLC 1 adds three different colours that can be used to customise your Table Ball experience. Make your bumpers and balls red, green or blue, it's all up to you in the Table Ball Colours DLC 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 2000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
